	# Economy tree

	## 2012 Elections
	### Democrat Victory
	focus = {
		id = USA_focus_2012_democrats
		icon = USA_democratic_party
		allow_branch = { date < 2017.1.1 }
		x = -3
		y = 0
		relative_position_id = USA_focus_ending_2011_fiscal_year
		cost = 0
		available = { always = no }
		bypass = {
			date > 2013.1.20
			NOT = {
				has_completed_focus = USA_focus_2012_republicans
			}
			custom_trigger_tooltip = {
  				tooltip = has_liberalism_government_TT

  				is_in_array = { ruling_party = 2 }
			}
		}

		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_POLITICAL }
		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_focus_2012_democrats"
		}

		ai_will_do = {

					}

					limit = { NOT = { has_tech = avionics_3 } }
					add_tech_bonus = {
						name = USA_focus_new_aircraft_models
						bonus = 0.05
						uses = 1
						technology = avionics_3
					}
				}
				if = {

						name = USA_focus_new_aircraft_models
						bonus = 0.05

	#######################
	#### Foreign Policy Tree ###
	#######################
	focus = {
		id = USA_focus_foreign_policy_plan
		icon = examine_foreign_laws
		x = 44
		y = 8
		cost = 2.2
		allow_branch = {
			NOT = {
				AND = {
					has_completed_focus = USA_focus_state_visit_to_canada
					has_completed_focus = USA_focus_state_visit_to_mexico
					has_completed_focus = USA_focus_state_visit_to_brazil
				}
			}
		}

	focus = {
		id = USA_continue_space_efforts
		icon = rocketry
		available = { date > 2008.1.1 }
		x = 22
		y = 13
		cost = 10
		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_RESEARCH }

			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_continue_space_efforts"
			add_ideas = continued_space_efforts
		}

		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	focus = {
		id = USA_finance_nasa
		icon = invest_nasa
		prerequisite = { focus = USA_continue_space_efforts }
		x = -1
		y = 1
		cost = 10
		relative_position_id = USA_continue_space_efforts

		mutually_exclusive = { focus = USA_finance_private_space_ventures }
		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_RESEARCH FOCUS_FILTER_POLITICAL }
		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_finance_nasa"
			add_political_power = 150
			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = continued_space_efforts
				add_idea = continued_space_efforts2
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = NASA_tt
			set_country_flag = finance_nasa
			set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -200 }
			modify_treasury_effect = yes
		}

		ai_will_do = {
			factor = 1
			modifier = {
				has_global_flag = USA_DEMOCRAT_PATH
				factor = 1000
			}
		}
	}

	focus = {
		id = USA_asteroid_mining
		icon = asteroid_mining
		relative_position_id = USA_continue_space_efforts
		x = 0
		y = 2
		cost = 8.6
		prerequisite = {
			focus = USA_finance_nasa
			focus = USA_finance_private_space_ventures
		}
		search_filters = { FOCUS_FILTER_RESOURCE }
		completion_reward = {
			log = "[GetDateText]: [Root.GetName]: Focus USA_asteroid_mining"
			country_event = donald_trump.8 #full return time will be roughly 5 years
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = finance_private_space_ventures }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = finance_nasa }
					add_political_power = 100
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = launch_pad_in_brazil }
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -400 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -500 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = launch_pad_in_brazil }
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -150 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -250 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = asteroid_mining_tt
		}

		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

			swap_ideas = {
				remove_idea = continued_space_efforts2
				add_idea = continued_space_efforts3
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = { has_country_flag = finance_private_space_ventures }
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = finance_nasa }
					add_political_power = 50
				}
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = launch_pad_in_brazil }
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -120 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -150 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
			}
			else = {
				if = {
					limit = { has_country_flag = launch_pad_in_brazil }
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -50 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
				else = {
					set_temp_variable = { treasury_change = -80 }
					modify_treasury_effect = yes
				}
			}
			custom_effect_tooltip = mission_to_mars_tt
		}

		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

	focus = {

				has_completed_focus = USA_skyline_to_space_bound_act

		}

			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.03 }
			USA_change_domestic_foreign_influence_defense_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = 0.01 }
			USA_change_domestic_nationalist_drift_change = yes
			set_temp_variable = { temp_change = -0.02 }
			USA_change_domestic_democratic_drift_change = yes
			USA_change_domestic_neutrality_drift_change = yes

			custom_trigger_tooltip = {

			set_temp_variable = { temp_outlook_increase = 0.10 }
			add_relative_party_popularity = yes
		}
		ai_will_do = { factor = 1 }
	}

#	id = <focus id>

#	cost = <number>
#
#	allow_branch = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	x = <position>
#	y = <position>
#	relative_position_id = <previous focus>
#	offset = {
#		x = <position>
#		y = <position>
#		trigger = {
#			<trigger>
#		}
#	}
#
#	prerequisite = {
#		focus = <focus id>
#	}
#
#	mutually_exclusive = {
#		focus = <focus id>
#	}
#
#	available = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	bypass = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	historical_ai = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	cancel = {
#		<trigger>
#	}
#
#	available_if_capitulated = <yes/no>
#	cancel_if_invalid = <yes/no>
#	continue_if_invalid = <yes/no>
#	will_lead_to_war_with = <tag>
#	search_filters = { <focus filters, separated by spaces if multiple> }
#
#	select_effect = {
#		<command>
#	}
#
#	completion_reward = {
#		<effect>
#	}
#
#	complete_tooltip = {
#		<effect>
#	}

#		factor = 1

#			<modifier>
